sentence.Network_en: The country is in the throes of a general election.
The regime is now in its death throes.
The creature went into its death throes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这小生命到了临终疼痛阶段。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 立体妖术记忆法全文阅读中国记忆力训练网 ... 抛掷 throws， 阵痛 throes， 洋装 dress，.

list.abs: throes是什么意思_throes的翻译_音标_读音... ... in death throes1.  处于临终痛苦 in the throes of1. 苦斗；挣扎.
one's [ the ] death throes死的苦痛，临终之苦
Black holes can be seen via the death throes of the matter being sucked in ., 经由正被吸引物质死亡阵痛能看见黑洞.
Thinking on you in the final throes , this is when my buzzer goes ., 在最终的剧痛中想到你 , 这时我的传呼机响起.

jx.jx_en_mean: in the middle of doing or dealing with something very difficult or painful

lj.lj_ly: a friend was in the throes of a divorce.
lj.lj_ls: 有个朋友正处于离婚痛苦中。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English throwe (singular); perhaps related to Old English thrēa, thrawu 'calamity', influenced by thrōwian 'suffer'

entry.def: If someone is experiencing something very unpleasant or emotionally painful, you can say that they are in the throes of it, especially when it is in its final stages.

example.ex: ...when the country was going through the final throes of civil war.
example.tran: 当时这个国家正处在内战最后的痛苦关头

entry.def: If you are in the throes of doing or experiencing something, especially something difficult, you are busy doing it or are deeply involved in it.

example.ex: The country is in the throes of a general election...
Despite being in the throes of school exams, Tamsin made the long trek from Liverpool.
example.tran: 虽然还要忙着准备学校的考试，塔姆辛还是完成了从利物浦出发的漫长而艰辛的跋涉。

auth_sentence.content: The throes of a mortal and painful disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content: The throes of a mortal and painful disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The throes of a mortal and painful disorder.

auth_sentence.content: Tumultuous throes Of some vast grief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tumultuous throes Of some vast grief.

auth_sentence.content: But I've been in the throes of them all my life.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I've been in the throes of them all my life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I've been in the throes of them all my life.
